title: President condoles death of Amir Wasim’s mother
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 25 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Monday phoned Amir Wasim, Bureau Chief, the daily Dawn, to express his condolence over the death of his mother.
The president offered fateha and prayed for the high ranks of the departed soul.
He observed that losing a personality like mother was the most painful period in one’s life.
